text: Vin skazav, "Todi idutʹ, ta, vsyudy vashe zhyttya, ne navitʹ prybuvayutʹ zakryvayutʹ. Vy mayete pryznachenyy chas (dlya vashoho zaklyuchnoho vyroku) shcho vy mozhete nikoly ne unyknuty. Podyvitʹsya na vashoho boha shcho vy zvychayno obozhnyuvaly; my spalymo tse ta kydayemo tse u more, shchob zalyshytysya vnyz tam zavzhdy
